title: New: OCEAN CALLING – Desert Sky Scarlet
body:
**Ocean Calling** (aka Sophie Wilkie) racked up the blog plaudits on her debut track, _Far West_.

Returning with another slice of Say Lou Lou meets M83 synth-pop, it’s equally as bold in production and romantically inclined in atmosphere. This is music to truly fall in love with and to. Check out _Desert Sky Scarlet_.

Returning with another slice of Say Lou Lou meets M83 synth-pop, it’s equally as bold in production and romantically inclined in atmosphere. This is music to truly fall in love with and to. Check out Desert Sky Scarlet.
